scripts.install: concurrently "cd client & npm install" "cd admin & npm install" "cd server & npm install"
scripts.dev:client: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run dev --prefix client"
scripts.dev:admin: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run dev --prefix admin"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run dev --prefix client" "npx dotenv -e .env -- npm run dev --prefix admin"
scripts.start:prod: concurrently "npm run start:server" "npm run preview:client" "npm run preview:admin"
